00000011 add (d = 1), (w = 1)
00011000 (mod = 00), (reg = 011), (rm = 000)
----------------------------------------------> add bx, [bx+si]

00000011 add (d = 1), (w = 1)
01011110 (mod = 01), (reg = 011), (rm = 110)
00000000 (disp0 = 0)
----------------------------------------------> add bx, [bp]

10000011 add (s = 1), (w = 1)
11000110 (mod = 11), (rm = 110)
00000010 (data0 = 2)
----------------------------------------------> add si, 2

10000011 add (s = 1), (w = 1)
11000101 (mod = 11), (rm = 101)
00000010 (data0 = 2)
----------------------------------------------> add bp, 2

10000011 add (s = 1), (w = 1)
11000001 (mod = 11), (rm = 001)
00001000 (data0 = 8)
----------------------------------------------> add cx, 8

00000011
01011110
00000000
----------------------------------------------> add bx, [bp + 0]

00000011
01001111
00000010
----------------------------------------------> add cx, [bx + 2]

00000010
01111010
